name: Ghostly (percysimms)
description:
Ghostly is a story-based 2D platformer about a psychic girl that can see ghosts, and help them pass on to the next life. After walking into the cemetery, she finds herself confronted by a ghost that needs help moving on. To do this, you will need to talk to the other ghosts in the cemetery to find the information he'll need to remember his past life and move on to the other side. You might need an external way to write down the information you find.

Use the arrow keys to move around

Use the Mouse to click on people and things
